SEARCH

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
Pizza
public class Pizza extends Object
The Pizza class allows customization of the number of cheese, pepperoni, and ham toppings, calculation of pizza cost, and comparison between two pizzas

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Pizza()
    Default constructor Initializes a small pizza with 1 cheese, 1 pepperoni, and 1 ham topping
    Pizza(String size, int numOfCheese, int numOfPepperoni, int numOfHam)
    Constructor with parameters to set
